name: Forest Boy
description:
Forest Boy is a platform die & retry 2d game 

Going through small levels, try to reach the princess as fast as possible ! However be careful to not going to close of the forest's brambles, this could be fatal...

----------------------------------------

Inspired from Super Meat Boy and Ori and The Blind Forest, this is my first stable game I made to release it publicly

----------------------------------------

You can find zip files to download containing unity build for Windows or Mac 

Any feedback is welcome, for me to improve and give a continuation game the day I will have time to get back on this game
